overview: An NBA Entertainment presenation of Wilton Norman Chamberlain. Standing at 7 ft 1 in tall, he played in the National Basketball Association for 14 years and is widely regarded as one of the greatest players in the sport's history. This documentary takes you from his days at Overbrook High School in Philadelphia, a collegiate experience at Kansas University, travelling the world with the Harlem Globetrotters, and astonishing feats that no NBA player before or since accomplished.
title: Wilt: The Dominant Force
